item.title: d.Construct Conference 2006 on in Brighton this autumn
item.description: d.Construct 2006 Theme: Web development Begins: Fri, 08 Sep 2006 at 9:00 AM Ends: Fri, 08 Sep 2006 at 5:30 PM **Location**: Brighton Corn Exchange Church Street Brighton UK Registration fee: Ã‚Â£75+VAT Last date for registration: Tue, 18 Jul 2006 Last date for paper submission: Tue, 18 Jul 2006 Walter Higgins is wondering who is heading to the d.Construct conference in Brighton and asked if I’d repost here to see if we have a decent contingent.
